title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Rush returns to calm the waters, not time to panic. Every day will be like this from now on. Why Trump talked to Woodward. If Trump wins, the Democrats will not stop trying to get rid of him. If what Trump said to Woodward is so important, why did Woodward hold it for months? They can't find any dirt on Trump. Woodward book won't change a vote. It's too much, too late. March 30: Trump told everyone at the time he didn't want to cause panic. It's not a scoop. February: Biden said coronavirus was no reason to panic too. Biden called Trump's China ban xenophobic. Fauci defends Trump against Woodward allegations. NFL season opens tonight with limited fans, sports media speculates fans may not show up. NFL still doesn't get the way its fans feel about anthem protests. Trump nominated for Nobel Peace Prize, like Rush. Arab League tells the Palestinians to go pound sand. Woodward’s books have a history of damaging Woodward, not the subjects. Woodward’s famous supposed deathbed interview with Bill Casey. Trump rips generals in Woodward book.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Rush sees focus group of "undecided" voters, woman says she voted for Trump in '16, but he didn't achieve bipartisanship in Washington. Trump voters didn't elect him to bring bipartisanship to Washington. Lackluster ticket sales in Kansas City for NFL opener attributed to coronavirus fears, but that's not the reason. Two-thirds of Portland voters disapprove of Mayor Ted Wheeler. Marxist leftists are not the majority. Kansas City Chief fan calls to say he's given up football because of anthem protests. Politicization of sports has taken magic, escapism out of the game and it cannot be recaptured. Mail-in ballot push may backfire on Democrats. Dems block pandemic relief bill.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

CNN has failed to get rid of Trump every day for four years. Trump approval has risen, Biden doing worse with blacks, Hispanics than Hillary did. Grassley tweet on Dems blocking coronavirus relief bill. CNN's Zucker on tape in 2016 sucking up to Trump in taped conversation with Michael Cohen. Trump does not use email. Trump voter on why every attempt to get Trump has failed with him. Poll: Majority against defunding police. We are being manipulated by a media minority. Election not shaping up to be a landslide against Donald Trump. We must show up in person to vote. Trump dismisses notion of white privilege in Woodward tapes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
